title: Can you help me finding this fonts?
content:
Hello, I am looking for two fonts, which are used in the book you can find below.  
Would be really glad when somebody can help me!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [unfolded.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116185003/http:/typophile.com/files/unfolded_0.jpg) | 89.23 KB |
author: paulpaul

comments.content:
The serif font is "Catalog" by Michael Mischler and Nik Thoenen at Binnenland. I have a sample in my Serif Font ID Guide.

- Mike Yanega

You can find it at their [web site](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116185003/http:/www.binnenland.ch/).

- Mike Yanega
